## ParticleEmitterManager.getAllParticleEmitters() method

Retrieves all spawned ParticleEmitter instances for the world.

**Signature:**

```typescript

```
**Returns:**

[ParticleEmitter](./server.particleemitter.md)<!-- -->\[\]
